T04nagvigvu:2: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
T04nagvigvu:3: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayitum svabhāvam alaṃ // NagVv_1 //
T04nagvigvu:4: yadi sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ hetau pratyayeṣu ca hetupratyayasāmagrāñ ca pṛthak ca yatra sarvatra svabhāvo na vidyata iti kṛtvā śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
T04nagvigvu:7: na pratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayeṣu samagreṣu na hetupratyayasāmagrāṃ na hetupratyayavinirmuktaḥ pṛthag eva vā /
T04nagvigvu:8: yasmād atra svabhāvo nāsti tasmān niḥsvabhāvo 'ṅkuraḥ /
T04nagvigvu:10: yathā cāyam aṅkuro niḥsvabhāvo niḥsvabhāvāc ca śūnyaḥ tathā sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnya iti /
T04nagvigvu:13: yady evaṃ tavāpi vacanaṃ yady etac chūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tad api śūnyaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:14: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tad api hetau nāsti /
T04nagvigvu:15: mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
T04nagvigvu:26: nāsatībhir atbhiḥ śakyaṃ kledayitum evam asattā vacanena śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kartuṃ na śakyaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo nivartayituṃ
T04nagvigvu:27: tatra yad uktaṃ sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣidhaḥ sarvatra bhāvasvabhāvo vinivartata iti / tan na //
T04nagvigvu:29: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hata pratijñā te /
T04nagvigvu:30: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_2 //
T04nagvigvu:31: athāpi manyase mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:33: tasmād anena sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvo vinivarta iti //
T04nagvigvu:35: yā hi te pratijñā śūnyāḥ svabhāvā iti /
T04nagvigvu:38: kasmāt sarvabhāveṣu tvadvacanam aśūnyaṃ yenāśūnyatvāt sarvabhāvasvabhāvaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:41: hanta cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvahhāvās tena tvadvacanaṃ śūnyam sarvabhāvāntargatatvāt tvadvacanasya /
T04nagvigvu:43: tatra yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāva iti anupapannaḥ / 1 /
T04nagvigvu:44: upapannaś cet punaḥ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaśūnyatvād anena pratiṣedho anupapannaḥ / 2 /
T04nagvigvu:45: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvās tvadvacanañ cāśūnyaḥ yena pratiṣedhas tena tvadvacanaṃ sarvatrāsaṃgṛhītaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:47: sarvatra cet punaḥ gṛhītaṃ tvadvacanaṃ sarvabhāvāś ca śūnyāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:48: tena tad api śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād anena nāsti pratiṣedhaḥ / 4 /
T04nagvigvu:49: atha śūnyam asti vānena pratiṣedhaḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti tena śūnyāpi sarvabhāvāḥ kāryakriyāsamarthā samarthabhaveyuḥ /
T04nagvigvu:51: atha śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ na ca kāryaṃ kriyāsamarthaṃ bhavaṃti mā bhūt dṛṣṭāntavirodha iti kṛtvā śūnyena tvadvacanena sarvabhāvāsvabhāvo pratiṣedho nopapanna iti / 6 /
T04nagvigvu:55: yena hi viśeṣahetunā kiñcit śūnyaṃ kiñcid aśūnyaṃ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:57: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:60: mā śabdavad ity etat syāt te buddhir na caitad upapannam /
T04nagvigvu:61: śabdenātra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasya // NagVv_3 //
T04nagvigvu:62: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā nāma kaścit brūyāt mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr mā śabdaṃ kārṣīr iti /
T04nagvigvu:65: śūnyena vacanena sarvatā sarvabhāvasvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti /
T04nagvigvu:68: satā hy atra śabdena hy atra bhaviṣyataḥ śabdasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:69: na punar iha bhavataḥ satā vacanena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:70: tava hi matena vacanam apy asat /
T04nagvigvu:72: tasmād ayaṃ mā śabdavad iti viṣayopanyāso 'sann iti //
T04nagvigvu:75: pratipratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
T04nagvigvu:76: evaṃ tava pratijña lakṣaṇato dūṣyate na mama // NagVv_4 //
T04nagvigvu:77: syāt te buddhiḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py anenaiva kalpenānupapannaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:82: kasmāt tava ca hi pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptam etan na mama bhavān iha bravīti /
T04nagvigvu:86: tatra yad uktaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evaṃ matam iti /
T04nagvigvu:90: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya vinivartayasi bhāvān /
T04nagvigvu:91: tan nāsti pratyakṣaṃ bhāvā yenopalabhyante // NagVv_5 //
T04nagvigvu:92: yadi pratyakṣataḥ sarvabhāvān upalabhya bhavān nivartayati śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
T04nagvigvu:94: kasmāt pratyakṣam api hi pramāṇaṃ svabhāvāntargatatvāt śūnyaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:95: yo 'pi sarvabhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyas tasmāt pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena nopalambhabhāvo anupalabdhasya ca pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ śūnyaḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
T04nagvigvu:99: anumānenāgamenopānena vā sarvabhāvān upalabhya sarvabhāvavyāvartanaṃ kriyata iti //
T04nagvigvu:103: anumānam apy upamānāgamāś ca pratyakṣeṇa pramāṇena pratyuktāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:104: yathā hi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt /
T04nagvigvu:108: te 'pi śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvāt* anumānopamānāgamaiś ca yo 'pi bhāvān upalabhate so 'pi śūnyaḥ tasmāt bbāvānām upalambhābhāvo 'nupalabdhānāñ ca svabhāvapratiṣedhānupapattiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:109: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti / tan na //
T04nagvigvu:113: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ // NagVv_7 //
T04nagvigvu:114: iha dharmāvasthāvido manyante kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ /
T04nagvigvu:117: sparśasya manasikārasya chandasyādhimokṣasya vīryasya smṛteḥ samādheḥ prajñāyā upekṣāyāḥ prayogasya saṃprayogasya prāpto 'dhyāśayasya prativirateḥ vyavasāyā autsukyasya /
T04nagvigvu:118: unmūrdhe utsāhasya avyārtyasya vasitāyāḥ pratipatter avipratīsārasya dhṛter adhyavasāyasya /
T04nagvigvu:127: hāsasya vācaḥ viṣpandanāyāḥ siddhasyāprasādasya aprasrabdheḥ vyavahāratāyaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:130: apradakṣiṇagrāhasya saṃepasya saṃvarāṇāṃ pariśuddher adhyāśayasya rūpasyeti /
T04nagvigvu:133: amada alobha adoṣa amoha asarvat* apratiniḥsargaḥ vibhava apatrayā apariśucchadanaṃ mānanaṃ kāruṇyaṃ maitrī adīnatādaritamari.(d)
T04nagvigvu:134: ha + + nupanāhaḥ alī cetaso paryādānaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:138: nairyāṇikatāsarvajñatāsaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ ity ekonaviṃśaṃ śataṃ kuśalānāṃ kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:156: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnya iti tan na /
T04nagvigvu:159: nairyāṇikasvabhāvo dharmo nairyāṇikāś ca ye teṣāṃ /
T04nagvigvu:161: iha ca dharmo 'vasthoktānāṃ nairyāṇikānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ niryāṇikaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:167: evaṃ śeṣāṇāṃ tad yasmād evam anekaprakāro dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:171: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāva ity evaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:172: nāmāpi bhavet naivaṃ nāmāpi nirvastukan nāsti // NagVv_9 //
T04nagvigvu:173: yadi ca dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ svabhāvānāṃ sadbhāvāc cāśūnyaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:174: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:177: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmāt /
T04nagvigvu:178: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasyāsti tad yuktam upadeṣṭum // NagVv_10 //
T04nagvigvu:179: atha manyase mā bhūd avastukaṃ nāmeti kṛtvāsti svabhāvaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:181: evaṃ dharmaśūnyatā ca niḥsvabhāvatvād dharmāṇāṃ siddhā bhaviṣyati /
T04nagvigvu:184: evaṃ kasyedānīṃ sa svabhāvo dharmavinirmuktasyārthasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭum arthaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:185: sa ca nopadiṣṭas tasmād yā kalpanāsti svabhāvo na punar dharmāṇām iti sā hīnā //
T04nagvigvu:187: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
T04nagvigvu:188: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho yaṃ sataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt // NagVv_11 //
T04nagvigvu:189: iha ca sato 'rthasya pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate nāmataḥ /
T04nagvigvu:193: evam eva nasti svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti /
T04nagvigvu:196: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:199: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin na pratiṣidhyate tvayānena /
T04nagvigvu:200: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_12 //
T04nagvigvu:201: nāsty eva svabhāvā ity anena vacanena niḥsvabhāvā bhāvā iti kiṃ bhavatā pratiṣidhyate /
T04nagvigvu:202: asato hi vacād vinā siddhaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:207: evaṃ mithyāḥ grāhaḥ syāt te pratiṣidhyate hy asataḥ // NagVv_13 //
T04nagvigvu:208: syāt te buddhiḥ yathā bālānāṃ mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ mithyājalam iti grāho bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:209: nanu nirjalā sā mṛgatṛṣṇeti tatra paṇḍitajātīyena puruṣeṇocyate /
T04nagvigvu:210: tasya mithyāgrāhasya vinivartanārtham evan niḥsvabhāveṣu yaḥ svabhāvo grāhaḥ satvānāṃ tasya vyāvartanārthan niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity ucyata iti //
T04nagvigvu:213: nanv evaṃ saty asti grāho grāhyañ ca tadgrahītā ca /
T04nagvigvu:214: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhā ceti ṣaṭkaṃ tat // NagVv_14 //
T04nagvigvu:215: yady evaṃ nanv evaṃ saty asti tāvat satvānāṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:217: asti pratiṣedhaḥ tasyāpi mithyāgrāhasyāsti pratiṣedhyaṃ yad idaṃ mithyāgrāhyaṃ nāma /
T04nagvigvu:218: santi pratiṣedhāro yuṣmadādayo 'sya mithyāgrāhasyeti siddhaṃ ṣaṭkam /
T04nagvigvu:220: yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:221: atha naivāsti grāho na ca grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāraḥ /
T04nagvigvu:222: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhāro 'py ata na santi // NagVv_15 //
T04nagvigvu:223: atha mā bhūd eṣa doṣa iti kṛtvā naiva grāho 'sti naiva grāhyaṃ na ca grahītāra iti /
T04nagvigvu:224: evaṃ sati yo 'sau grāhasya pratiṣedhaḥ niḥsvahhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti /
T04nagvigvu:225: so 'pi nāsti pratiṣedhyam api nāsti pratiṣedhāro 'pi na santi /
T04nagvigvu:227: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyaṃ pratiṣedhārāaś ca yady uta na santi /
T04nagvigvu:228: siddhā hi sarvabhāvā yeṣām evaṃ svabhāvaś ca // NagVv_16 //
T04nagvigvu:229: yadi ca na pratiṣedho na pratiṣedhyaṃ na pratiṣeddhāraḥ santy apratisiddhāḥ sarvabhāvā asti ca sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:231: hetoḥ svato na siddhiḥ naiḥsvābhāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ /
T04nagvigvu:232: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya // NagVv_17 //
T04nagvigvu:233: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā ity etasmin arthe te hetor asiddhiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:234: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād dhi sarvabhāvānāṃ śūnyatvān na tato hetuḥ /
T04nagvigvu:235: asati hetau nirhetukasyārthasya śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti kuta eva prasiddhiḥ //
T04nagvigvu:236: tatra yad uktaṃ śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:238: yadi cāhetoḥ siddhiḥ svabhāvavinivartanasya te bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:240: atha manyase nairhetukī siddhiḥ niḥsvabhāvatvasya bhāvānām iti /
T04nagvigvu:244: atha hetor astitvaṃ bhāvānaiḥsvābhāvyam ity anupapannam /
T04nagvigvu:245: loko naiḥsvabhāvyān na hi kaścana vidyate bhāvaḥ // NagVv_19 //
T04nagvigvu:249: na hi loke niḥsvabhāvaḥ kaścid bhāvo 'sti //
T04nagvigvu:251: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam iti na copapannam /
T04nagvigvu:252: yaś cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'san // NagVv_20 //
T04nagvigvu:253: iha pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāc ca pratiṣedhyaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:256: atha paścāt pratiṣedhaḥ pūrvaṃ pratiṣedhyam iti ca nopapannaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:257: siddhe hi pratiṣedhye kiṃ pratiṣedhaḥ karoti /
T04nagvigvu:258: atha yugapatpratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhye tathāpi na pratiṣedhyaḥ pratiṣedhyasyārthasya kāraṇaṃ prati na pratiṣedhyaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:260: yathā yugapadutpannayor goviṣāṇayoḥ naiva dakṣiṇaṃ savyasya kāraṇaṃ savyaṃ vā dakṣiṇasya gāraṇaṃ bhavatīti /
T04nagvigvu:261: tatra yad uktaṃ niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na /
T04nagvigvu:264: sarveṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ sarvatra na vidyate svabhāvaś cet /
T04nagvigvu:265: tvadvacanam asvabhāvaṃ na nivartayituṃ svabhāvam alam iti / [1]
T04nagvigvu:268: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhāvānām asvabhāvatvāt // NagVv_21 //
T04nagvigvu:269: yadi madvaco hetau nāsti mahābhūteṣu saṃprayukteṣu viprayukteṣu vā pratyayeṣu nāsti /
T04nagvigvu:270: uraḥkaṇthojihvādantatālunāsikamūrdhaprabhṛtiṣu ya + + sāmagryām asti heṃpratyayasāmagrīṃ vinirmuktaṃ pṛthag vāsti /
T04nagvigvu:273: nanu śūnyatvaṃ siddhaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvād asya madīyavacasaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:276: yad bhavatoktaṃ tvadīyavacasaḥ śūnyatvāt śūnyatā sarvabhāvānāṃ nopapadyata iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:279: yaś ca pratītya bhāvānāṃ śūnyateti taṃ brū + + /
T04nagvigvu:280: yas tu pratītyabhāvo bhavati hi tasyāsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_22 //
T04nagvigvu:281: śūnyatārthañ ca bhavān bhāvānām anavasamya śūnyatārtham ajñātvā pravṛtti upālambhaṃ
T04nagvigvu:282: vaktuṃ tvadvacanasya śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya niḥsvabhāvatvād evaṃ tvadvacanena niḥsvabhāvena
T04nagvigvu:284: iha hi yaḥ pratītya bhavānāṃ bhāvaḥ sā śūnyatā /
T04nagvigvu:286: ye hi pratītyasamutpānnā bhāvās te sa sasvabhāvā bhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:292: tasmān niḥsvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāc chūnyā ity abhidhīyante /
T04nagvigvu:294: pratītyasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyam ity upapannaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:297: rathapaṭaghaṭādayaḥ sveṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu kāṣṭhāhaṇamṛttikaharaṇamadhūdakapayasāṃ dhāraṇā śītavātātapaparitrāṇaprabhṛtiṣu vartante /
T04nagvigvu:298: evam idaṃ madīyavacanaṃ pratyayasamutpannatvān niḥsvabhāvaṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaprasādhanaṃ pratyayabhāvānāṃ vartate /
T04nagvigvu:300: niḥsvabhavatvāt tvadīyavacanasya śūnyatvaṃ śūnyatvāt tasya ca tena sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedha upapannam iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:304: pratiṣedhayati yadvat pratiṣedho yaṃ tathaiva syāt // NagVv_23 //
T04nagvigvu:305: yathā nirmitakaḥ puruṣam abhyāpataṃ tu kaścid arthena vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
T04nagvigvu:306: māyākāreṇa vā sṛṣṭo māyāpurnṣo 'nyaṃ māyāpuruṣa samabhyava tan na kasminścid arthe vartamānaṃ pratiṣedhayet /
T04nagvigvu:307: tatra yo nirmitakaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiṣedhyate sa śūnyaḥ yaḥ pratiṣedhayati so 'pi māyāpuruṣaḥ śūnya evam eva madvacanena śūnyena sarvabhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedha upapannaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:309: śūnyatvāt tvadvacanasya sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedho nopapannam iti na tan na /
T04nagvigvu:310: ṣaṭkoṭiko vāda uktaḥ sa evaṃ pratisiddhaḥ naiva hy evaṃ sati na sarvabhāvāntargataṃ madvacanaṃ nāpy aśūnyaṃ nāpi sarvabhāvāśūnyāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:313: atha sasvabhāvam etad vākyaṃ pūrvā hatā pratijñā te
T04nagvigvu:314: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavya ity [2]
T04nagvigvu:316: na svābhāvikam etad vākyaṃ tasmān na vādahānir me /
T04nagvigvu:317: nāsti ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ viśesahetuś ca na nigadyaḥ // NagVv_24 //
T04nagvigvu:318: na tāvad etan mama vacanaṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt svabhāvopapannaṃ yathā pūrvam uktaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:320: yasmāc ca idam api madvacanaṃ śūnyaṃ śeṣāpi sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyās tasmān nāsti vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:322: idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti tato vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:323: syān na caitad evaṃ tasmān na vaiṣamikatvaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:324: yasmāc ca vaiṣamikatvaṃ na saṃbhavati idaṃ vacanam aśūnyaṃ śeṣāḥ punaḥ sarvabhāvāḥ śūnyā iti /
T04nagvigvu:325: tasmād asmābhir viśeṣahetur api na vaktavyaḥ anena idaṃ vacanaṃ aśūnyaṃ sarvabhāvāḥ punaḥ śūnyā iti /
T04nagvigvu:326: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ vādahānis te vaiṣamikatvaṃ ca viśeṣahetuś ca tvayā vaktavya iti tan na /
T04nagvigvu:329: mā śabdavad ity etad asmāt te buddhir na caitad upapannaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:330: śabdena hy atra satā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti / [3]
T04nagvigvu:332: mā śabdavad iti nāyaṃ dṛṣṭānto yas tvayā mamārahdhaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:333: śabdena hi tac ca śabdasya vāraṇaṃ naidam eva caḥ // NagVv_25 //
T04nagvigvu:335: yathā kaścin mā śabdaṃ karṣīr iti bruvaṃ śabdam eva karoti śabdañ ca pratiṣedhayati /
T04nagvigvu:338: atra hi dṛṣṭānte śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:340: niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt tad aśūnyām iti /
T04nagvigvu:343: naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ cen naiḥsvābhāvyena vāraṇaṃ yadi hi /
T04nagvigvu:344: naiḥsvabhāvyanirvṛttau svabhāvyaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ syāt // NagVv_26 //
T04nagvigvu:345: yathā mā śabdam iti śabdena śabdasya vyāvartanaṃ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:346: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena naiḥsvabhāvyānāṃ vyāvartanaṃ kriyate tato 'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntopapannaḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:347: iha tu naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena bhāvānāṃ svabhāvapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:348: evaṃ yadi naiḥsvabhāvyena vacanena niḥsvabhāvānāṃ naiḥsvabhāvyapratiṣedhaḥ kriyate /
T04nagvigvu:351: śūnyatāñ ca vayaṃ bhāvānām ācakṣmahe nāśūnyatām ity adṛṣṭānta evāyam iti /
T04nagvigvu:353: atha vā nirmitakāyāṃ yathā striyāṃ striyam ity asatgrāham /
T04nagvigvu:354: nirmitakaḥ pratihanyāt kasyacid evaṃ bhaved ettata // NagVv_27 //
T04nagvigvu:355: atha vā kasyacit puruṣasya nirmitakāyāṃ striyāṃ svabhāvaśūnyāyāṃ paramārthataḥ striyam ity asadgrāhaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:356: syād eva tasyāṃ tenāsadgrāheṇa rāgam utpādayet /
T04nagvigvu:357: tad yathā tathāgatena vā tacchrāvakeṇa vā nirmitako nirmitaḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:358: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena vā tathāgatasrāvakādhiṣṭhānena vā tasya tam asadgrāhaṃ vinivartayet /
T04nagvigvu:359: evam eva nirmitakopamena śūnyena vacanena nirmitakastrīsadṛśyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu yo 'yaṃ svabbāvagrāhaḥ sa nivartyate sa pratiṣidhyate /
T04nagvigvu:360: tasmād ayam atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ śūnyatāprasādhanaṃ pratyupapadyamāno netaraḥ /
T04nagvigvu:362: atha vā sādhyasamo yaṃ hetur na hi vidyate dhvaneḥ sattā /
T04nagvigvu:363: saṃvyavahārañ ca vayaṃ nānabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ // NagVv_28 //
T04nagvigvu:364: mā śabdavad iti sādhyasama evāyaṃ hetuḥ /
T04nagvigvu:370: śabdena hy atra sattā bhaviṣyato vāraṇaṃ tasyeti /
T04nagvigvu:372: api ca na vayaṃ vyavahārasatyaṃ pratyākhyāya vyavahārasatyam anabhyupagamya kathayāmaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:374: na hi vyavahārasatyam anāgamya śakyā dharmadeśanā kartuṃ /
T04nagvigvu:377: paramārtham anāgamya nirvāṇaṃ nādhigamyata iti / [= MMK 24.18]
T04nagvigvu:378: tasmān madvacanavat śūnyāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvānāñ ca niḥsvabhāvatvam ubhayathopapadyamānam iti //
T04nagvigvu:381: pratiṣedhaḥ pratiṣedhyo 'py evam iti mataṃ bhavet tad asad eva /
T04nagvigvu:382: evaṃ tava pratijñā lakṣaṇato dūṣyeta na mameti / [4]
T04nagvigvu:384: yadi kācana pratijñā tatra syān na me tat* eṣa me bhaved doṣaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:385: nāsti ca mama pratijñā tasmān naivāsti me doṣaḥ // NagVv_29 //
T04nagvigvu:386: yadi ca kācin mama pratijñā syāt tato mama pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt sa pūrvako doṣaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:387: yathā tvayoktaṃ bhāvāḥ tathā mama syān na ca mama kācid asti pratijñā /
T04nagvigvu:388: tasmāt sarvahhāveṣu śūnyeṣv atyantopaśānteṣu prakṛtivivikteṣu kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptiḥ kutaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇatāprāptikṛto doṣaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:389: tatra yat bhavatoktaṃ pratijñālakṣaṇaprāptatvāt tavaiva doṣa iti tan nāsti /
T04nagvigvu:392: pratyakṣeṇa hi tāvad yady upalabhya nivartayasi bhāvān
T04nagvigvu:397: yadi kiñcid upalabheyaṃ pravarteyaṃ nivartayeyaṃ vā /
T04nagvigvu:399: yady ahaṃ kiñcid artham upalabheyaṃ pratyakṣānumānopa + + + + hetubhiḥ pramāṇaiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:402: ata evaṃ pravartayeyaṃ vārtham evāhaṃ kiñcin nopalabhate tasmān na pravartayāmi na nivartayāmi /
T04nagvigvu:404: yadi pratyakṣādīnāṃ pramāṇānām anyatamena upalabhya bhāvān vinivartayasīti /
T04nagvigvu:405: nanu bhavatoktāni pramāṇāni na santi taiś ca pramāṇair api gamyārthā iti sa me bhavaty evānupālambha iti /
T04nagvigvu:407: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣāṃ prasiddhir arthānām /
T04nagvigvu:408: teṣāṃ punaḥ prasiddhiṃ brūhi kathaṃ teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_31 //
T04nagvigvu:410: yadi ca pramāṇatas teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ prameyānāṃ siddhiṃ manyase yathā mānair meyānāṃ /
T04nagvigvu:411: tathā teṣām idānīṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamānāṃ caturṇāṃ pramāṇānāṃ kutaḥ prasiddhiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:412: yadi tāvan niḥpramāṇānāṃ pramāṇaṃ syān nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
T04nagvigvu:413: yadi punaḥ manyase pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ pramāṇato 'rthānāṃ prasiddhir iti /
T04nagvigvu:417: anyaiḥ yadi pramāṇaiḥ pramāṇasidhir bhavaty anavasthā syān /
T04nagvigvu:418: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya // NagVv_32 //
T04nagvigvu:420: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāṇāṃ prasiddhis teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:422: nādeḥ siddhis tatrāsti naiva madhyasya nāntasya /
T04nagvigvu:424: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ teṣam api hi pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ siddhis teṣām anyair iti nāsty ādiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:425: āder asadbhāvāt kuto madhyaṃ kuto antaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:426: tasmāt teṣāṃ pramāṇānām anyaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ nopapadyateti /
T04nagvigvu:428: teṣām atha pramāṇair vinā prasiddhiḥ vihīyate vādaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:429: vaiṣamikatvaṃ tasmin viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ // NagVv_33 //
T04nagvigvu:430: atha manyase teṣāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vinā pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ prameyānāṃ punar arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir iti /
T04nagvigvu:431: evaṃ sati yas te vādaḥ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhir arthānām iti hīyate vaiṣamikatvañ ca bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:433: arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti viśeṣahetuś ca vaktavyaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:434: yena hetunā keṣāṃcid arthānāṃ pramāṇaiḥ prasiddhiḥ keṣāñcin neti /
T04nagvigvu:435: sā ca nopadiṣṭaḥ tasmād iyam api kalpanā nopapanneti /
T04nagvigvu:436: atrāha / pramāṇāny eva mama svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ca prasādhayanti / yathoktaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:437: dyotayati svātmānaṃ yathā hutāsaḥ tathā parātmānaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:442: viṣamopanyāso 'yaṃ na hy ātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ /
T04nagvigvu:443: na hi tasyānupalabdhiḥ dṛṣṭā tamasīva kumbhasya // NagVv_34 //
T04nagvigvu:445: agnivat pramāṇāni svātmānañ ca prasādhayanti parātmānañ ca prasādhayantīti /
T04nagvigvu:447: yadi hi yathā prāg evāgninā aprakāśitas tamasi kumbho nopalabhyate /
T04nagvigvu:448: athottarakālam upalabhyate 'gninā prakāśitaḥ san evam eva yady agninā na prakāśitaḥ prāg agniḥ syād uttarakālam agneḥ prakāśanaṃ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:453: yadi ca svātmānam ayaṃ tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
T04nagvigvu:454: param iva na tv ātmānaṃ paridhakṣyaty api hutāśaḥ // NagVv_35 //
T04nagvigvu:455: yadi ca tvadvacanena yathā parātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ evam eva svātmānam api prakāśayaty agnir iti /
T04nagvigvu:459: tatra yad uktaṃ parātmānam iva svātmānaṃ prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:461: yadi ca svaparātmānau tvadvacanena prakāśayaty agniḥ /
T04nagvigvu:462: prachādayiṣyati tamaḥ svaparātmānau hutāśa iva // NagVv_36 //
T04nagvigvu:463: yadi ca bhavato bhavato matena svātmāparātmānau prakāśayaty agniḥ /
T04nagvigvu:466: tatra yad uktaṃ svaparātmānau prakāśayaty agnir iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:469: nāsti tamaś ca jvalane yatra ca tiṣṭhate parātmani jvalanaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:470: kurute kathaṃ prakāśaṃ sa hi prakāśo andhakāravadhaḥ // NagVv_37 //
T04nagvigvu:473: prakāśaś ca nāma tamasaḥ pratighātas tatra katham asya tamasaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:476: āha / yad yasmād evaṃ nāgnau tamo 'sti /
T04nagvigvu:478: yasmād evaṃ svaparātmānau na prakāśayaty agniḥ /
T04nagvigvu:479: tena hy utpadyamānenaivāgninā tamasaḥ pratighataḥ kutaḥ tasmān nāgnau tamo 'sti /
T04nagvigvu:481: yasmād utpadyamāna evobhayaṃ prakāśayaty agniḥ svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
T04nagvigvu:484: utpadyamāna eva prakāśayaty agnir ity asadvādaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:485: utpadyamāna eva prāpnoti tamo na hi hutāśaḥ // NagVv_38 //
T04nagvigvu:486: ayam agnir utpadyamāna eva prakāśayati svātmānaṃ parātmānañ ceti /
T04nagvigvu:488: kasmān na hy utpadyamāna evāgniḥ tamaḥ prāpnoti /
T04nagvigvu:491: aprāpto 'pi jvalano yadi vā punar andhakāram upahanyāt /
T04nagvigvu:492: sarveṣu lokadhātuṣu tamo 'yam iha saṃsthita upahanyāt // NagVv_39 //
T04nagvigvu:493: athāpi manyase aprāpto 'py agnir andhakāram upahantīti /
T04nagvigvu:494: nanv idānīm iha saṃsthito agniḥ sarvalokadhātustham upahaniṣyati tamaḥ tulyāyām aprāpto na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:495: tasmād aprāpyaivāgnir andhakāram upahantīti yad iṣṭaṃ / tan na /
T04nagvigvu:497: yadi ca svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir anapekṣya te prameyāṇi /
T04nagvigvu:498: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāparāpekṣā hi siddhir iti // NagVv_40 //
T04nagvigvu:499: yadi cāgnivat svataḥ pramāṇasiddhir iti manyase /
T04nagvigvu:500: anapekṣāpi prameyāṇi pramāṇānāṃ siddhiḥ bhaviṣyatīti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:503: atrāha / yadi nāpekṣyante prameyān arthān apramāṇāni ko doṣo bhaviṣyatīti / atrocyate /
T04nagvigvu:504: anāpeksā hi prameyān arthān yadi te pramāṇasaṃsiddhiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:505: bhavati na bhavanti kasyacid evam imāni pramāṇāni // NagVv_41 //
T04nagvigvu:506: yadi prameyān arthān anapekṣya siddhir bhavati pramāṇānām iti /
T04nagvigvu:507: tānīmāni pramāṇāni na kasyacit pramāṇāni bhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:510: naivedānīm anapekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇāni bhavanti //
T04nagvigvu:512: atha matam apekṣa siddhis teṣām iti atra bhavati ko doṣaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:513: siddhasya na sādhanaṃ syān nāsiddho pekṣate hy anyat // NagVv_42 //
T04nagvigvu:514: athāpi matam apekṣya prameyān arthān pramāṇānāṃ siddhir bhavatīti /
T04nagvigvu:515: evaṃ te sati siddhasya pramāṇacatuṣṭayasya sādhanaṃ bhavatīti /
T04nagvigvu:518: na hy asiddho devadattaḥ kañcid artham apekṣate na ca siddhasya sādhanam iṣṭaṃ kṛtasya kāraṇam anupapatter iti //
T04nagvigvu:520: sidhyanti hi prameyāṇy apekṣya yadi sarvathā pramāṇāni /
T04nagvigvu:524: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na hi sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhayati /
T04nagvigvu:529: yadi ca prameyasiddhir anapekṣaiva bhavati pramāṇāni /
T04nagvigvu:530: kin te pramāṇasiddhyā tāni yad arthaṃ prasiddhaṃ tata // NagVv_44 //
T04nagvigvu:531: yadi ca manyase 'napekṣyaiva pramāṇāni prameyānāṃ prasiddhir bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:532: kim idānīṃ te pramāṇasiddhyā paryanviṣṭayā kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:533: yad arthaṃ hi tāni pramāṇāni paryanviṣyeran /
T04nagvigvu:534: te prameyārthā vinā pramāṇaiḥ siddhāḥ tatra kiṃ pramāṇaiḥ kṛtyaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:535: atha tu pramāṇasiddhir bhavaty apekṣyaiva te prameyāṇi /
T04nagvigvu:536: vyatyaya evaṃ sati te dhruvaṃ pramāṇaprameyāṇāṃ // NagVv_45 //
T04nagvigvu:537: athāpi manyase 'pekṣyaiva prameyān arthāna pramāṇani bhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:538: evaṃ te sati mā bhūt pūrvoktadoṣa iti kṛtvā /
T04nagvigvu:539: evaṃ te sati vyatyayaḥ + + + + + yāṇāṃ bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:545: atha te pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhiḥ prameyasiddhyā ca /
T04nagvigvu:546: bhavati pramāṇasiddhiḥ nāsty ubhayasyāpi te siddhiḥ // NagVv_46 //
T04nagvigvu:547: atha manyase pramāṇasiddhyā prameyasiddhir bhavati pramāṇāpekṣatvāt /
T04nagvigvu:548: prameyasiddhyā ca pramāṇasiddhir bhavati prameyāpekṣatvād iti //
T04nagvigvu:549: evaṃ saty ubhayasyāpi siddhir na .y. + + + + ṇaṃ
T04nagvigvu:550: sidhyanti hi pramāṇair yadi prameyāṇi tāni tair evā /
T04nagvigvu:551: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_47 //
T04nagvigvu:552: yadi hi pramāṇaiḥ pramayāṇi sidhyanti tāni pramāṇāni tair eva prameyaiḥ sādhayitavyāni /
T04nagvigvu:553: nanv asiddheṣu prameyeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayisyanti prameyāṇīti /
T04nagvigvu:555: sidhyanti ca prameyaiḥ yadi pramāṇāni tāni tair eva /
T04nagvigvu:556: sādhyāni ca prameyais tāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti // NagVv_48 //
T04nagvigvu:557: yadi prameyaiḥ pramāṇāni sidhyanti tāni ca prameyāṇi tair eva pramāṇaiḥ sādhayitavyānīti /
T04nagvigvu:558: nanv asiddheṣu pramāṇeṣu kāraṇasyāsiddhatvād asiddhāni kathaṃ sādhayiṣyanti pramāṇāni /
T04nagvigvu:559: pitra yady utpādyaḥ putro yadi tena caiva putreṇa /
T04nagvigvu:560: utpādyaḥ sa yadi pitā vada tatrotpādayati kaḥ kaṃ // NagVv_49 //
T04nagvigvu:562: pitrā putra utpādanīyaḥ sa ca pitā putreṇotpādanīya iti /
T04nagvigvu:565: pramāṇaiḥ prameyāni sādhayitavyāni tāny eva ca punaḥ pramāṇāni taiḥ prameyaiḥ tatredānīṃ tu katamaiḥ katamāni sādhayitavyāni /
T04nagvigvu:567: kaś ca pitā kaḥ putraḥ tatra tvaṃ brūhi kathaṃ tāv ubhāv api ca /
T04nagvigvu:568: pitreputralakṣaṇadharau yato nas tatra saṃdehaḥ // NagVv_50 //
T04nagvigvu:569: tayoś ca pūrvopadiṣṭayoḥ pitāputrayoḥ vada kataraḥ putraḥ kataraḥ pitā ubhāv api tāv utpādakatvāt pitṛlakṣaṇadharau /
T04nagvigvu:570: utpādyatvāc ca putralakṣaṇadharāv atra naḥ sandeho bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:571: kataras tatra pitā kataras tatra putra iti /
T04nagvigvu:575: ubhayāny api hy etāni pramāṇāni tāni prameyāṇi sādhyatvāt prameyāṇīti /
T04nagvigvu:579: naiva svataḥ prasiddhir na parasparataḥ pramāṇair vā /
T04nagvigvu:580: bhavati na ca prameyaiḥ na cāpy akasmāt pramāṇānāṃ // NagVv_51 //
T04nagvigvu:581: na svataḥ prasiddhiḥ pratyakṣasya tenaiva pratyakṣeṇānumānasya tenaivānumāne /
T04nagvigvu:584: nāpi parasyāt pratyakṣasyānumānopamānāgamair anumānasya pratyakṣopamānāgamair upamānasya pratyakṣānumānāgamaiḥ /
T04nagvigvu:586: nāpi pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamād anyaiḥ pratyakṣānumānopamānāgamair yathāsvaṃ nāpi prameyaiḥ samastavyastaiḥ svaviṣayaparaviṣatāgṛhītaiḥ nāpy akasmān nāsti samuccayena /
T04nagvigvu:587: eteṣāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pūrvoddiṣṭānāṃ viṃśas triṃśac catvāriśat ṣaṭviṃśatir vā tatra yad uktaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:588: pramāṇādhigamyatvāt prameyāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ santi tu prameyā bhāvās tāni ca pramāṇāni yais tu pramāṇaiḥ prameyā bhāvāḥ santaś ca bhāvāḥ samādhigatā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:592: kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante śeṣeṣv apy eṣa viniyogaḥ / [7]
T04nagvigvu:596: kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmāvasthavidaḥ kuśalaṃ janasvabhāvaṃ manyante /
T04nagvigvu:598: syād ayaṃ sa kuśalaḥ svabhāvaḥ ime te kuśalā dharmā iti /
T04nagvigvu:599: idaṃ tatkuśalavijñānam ayaṃ kuśalavijñānasvabhāva evaṃ sarveṣāṃ na caitad evaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:600: tasmād yad uktam upadiṣṭaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇām iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:603: yadi ca pratītya kuśalaḥ svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
T04nagvigvu:604: dharmāṇāṃ parabhāvaḥ svabhāva eva kathaṃ bhavati // NagVv_53 //
T04nagvigvu:605: yadi ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo hetupratyayasāmagrīṃ pratītyotpadyate /
T04nagvigvu:606: parabhāvād utpannaḥ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ svabhāvo bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:610: evam akuśalānām akuśalādir iti / tan na //
T04nagvigvu:612: atha na pratītya kiñcit svabhāva utpadyate sa kuśalānām /
T04nagvigvu:613: dharmāṇām evaṃ syād vāso na brahmacaryasya // NagVv_54 //
T04nagvigvu:615: na kiñcit pratītya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kuśalasvabhāva utpadyate /
T04nagvigvu:616: evam akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām akuśalaḥ avyākṛtānām avyākṛta iti /
T04nagvigvu:617: evaṃ saty abrahmacaryavāso bhavati kiṃ kāraṇaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:618: pratītyasamutpādasya hi evaṃ sati pratyākhyānaṃ bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:620: na hy avidyamānasya pratītyasamutpādasya darśanam utpadyamānaṃ bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:623: bhagavatā yo hi bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
T04nagvigvu:630: asati hi samudaye tat kuto duḥkhaṃ samudeṣyati /
T04nagvigvu:632: asati hi duḥkhasamudaye kasya prahāṇān nirodho bhaviṣyati /
T04nagvigvu:633: asati hi duḥkhanirodhe kasya prāptaye mārgo bhaviṣyati /
T04nagvigvu:639: nādharmo dharmo vā satyavyavahārāś ca lokikā ni syuḥ /
T04nagvigvu:640: nityāś ca sarvabhāvāḥ syuḥ nityatvād ahetumataḥ // NagVv_55 //
T04nagvigvu:642: evaṃ sati pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratyācakṣaṇasya bhavataḥ ko doṣa prasajyate /
T04nagvigvu:643: dharmo na bhavati adharmo na bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:645: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ hy etat sarvam asati pratītyasamutpāde kuto bhaviṣyati /
T04nagvigvu:646: api ca sasvabhāvo 'pratītyasamutpanno nirhetuko nityaḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:647: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nirhetukā hi bhāvā nityās tatra sa eva cābrahmacaryavāsaḥ prasajyet svasiddhāntavirodhaś ca /
T04nagvigvu:648: kiṃ kāraṇam anityā hi bhagavatā sarve saṃskārā nirdeṣṭās te svabhāvanityatvān nityā hi bhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:649: eṣa cākuśaleṣv avyākṛteṣu nairyāṇādiṣu ca doṣas /
T04nagvigvu:650: tasmāt sarvaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ te bhavaty evaṃ // NagVv_56 //
T04nagvigvu:651: yaś caiṣa kuśaleṣu nirdeṣṭaḥ kalpaḥ sa evākuśaleṣu sa evāvyākṛteṣu sa evānairyāṇikaprabhṛtiṣu doṣas tasmāt sarvam idaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ saṃpadyate //
T04nagvigvu:652: kiṃkāraṇaṃ heto hy asaty utpādasthitibhaṅgā na bhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:655: tatra yad uktaṃ kuśalādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ svabhāvasadbhāvād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:658: yadi ca na bhavet svabhāvo bhāvānāṃ na svabhāva ity evaṃ
T04nagvigvu:659: nāmāpi bhaved evaṃ nāma hi nirvastukaṃ nāsti / [9]
T04nagvigvu:660: yaḥ sadbhūtaṃ nāma brūyāt sasvabhāva ity evam /
T04nagvigvu:661: bhavatā prativaktavyo nāma brūmaś ca na vayaṃ sata // NagVv_57 //
T04nagvigvu:662: yo nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūyāt sasvabhāva iti sa bhavatā prativaktavyaḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:665: na hy asadbhūtasya svabhāvasya sadbhūtaṃ nāma bhavatīti /
T04nagvigvu:666: na punar vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtaṃ brūmas tad api hi svabhāvasyābhāvān nāma niḥsvabhāvatvāt śūnyaṃ śūnyatvād asadbhūtam /
T04nagvigvu:667: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ nāmasadbhāvāt sadbhūtaḥ svahhāvā iti / tan na //
T04nagvigvu:670: nāmāsad iti ca yad idaṃ tat kiṃ nu sato bhavaty utāsataḥ /
T04nagvigvu:671: yadi hi sato yady asato dvidhāpi te hīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_58 //
T04nagvigvu:672: yac caitan nāmāsad iti tat kiṃ sataḥ asataḥ /
T04nagvigvu:673: yadi hi satas tan nāma yady asata ubhayathāpi pratijñā hīyate /
T04nagvigvu:676: na hīdanīṃ tad asad idānīṃ sat* athāsata /
T04nagvigvu:677: asad iti nāma yā pratijñā asadbhūtasya nāma na bhavati astitvasvabhāva iti nāma tasmāt sadbhūtaḥ svabhāva iti / sā hīnā //
T04nagvigvu:680: sa upālambhaḥ tasmād bhavaty ayañ cāpratijñāyāḥ // NagVv_59 //
T04nagvigvu:681: iha cāsmābhiḥ pūrvam eva sarveṣāṃ bhāvānaṃ vistarataḥ śūnyatvam upapāditam /
T04nagvigvu:682: tatra prāg nāmano 'pi śūnyatvam uktaṃ saṃbhavā aśūnyatvaṃ parigṛhya pravṛtto vaktuṃ /
T04nagvigvu:683: yadi bhāvānāṃ svābhāvo na syād asvabhāva iti nāmāpīdan na syād iti /
T04nagvigvu:685: na hi vayaṃ nāma sadbhūtam iti brūmaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:688: atha vidyate svabhāvas sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyate sa tasmāt
T04nagvigvu:689: dharmair vinā svabhāvaḥ sa yasya tad yuktam upadeṣṭuṃ / [10]
T04nagvigvu:690: atha vidyate svabhāvaḥ sa ca dharmāṇāṃ na vidyatat iti idam /
T04nagvigvu:691: āśaṅkitaṃ yad uktaṃ bhavaty anāśaṅkitaṃ tac ca // NagVv_60 //
T04nagvigvu:692: na hi vayaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ pratiṣedhayāmaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:693: dharmavinirmuktasya vā kasyacid arthasya svabhāvam abhyupagacchāmaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:694: nanv evaṃ sati ya upālambho bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:695: yadi dharmā niḥsvabhāvāḥ kasya khalv idānīm anyasyārthasya dharmavinirmuktasya svabhāvo bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:700: sata eva pratiṣedho nāsti ghaṭo geha ity ayaṃ yasmāt /
T04nagvigvu:701: dṛṣṭaḥ pratiṣedho 'yaṃ mataḥ svabhāvasya te tasmāt / [11] ity
T04nagvigvu:703: sata eva pratiṣedho yadi śūnyatvaṃ nanv apratisiddham idam /
T04nagvigvu:704: pratiṣedhayate hi hhavān bhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ // NagVv_61 //
T04nagvigvu:711: pratiṣedhayase atha tvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ tac ca nāsti śūnyatvam /
T04nagvigvu:712: pratiṣedhaḥ sata iti te nanv eṣa vihīyate vādaḥ // NagVv_62 //
T04nagvigvu:714: sarvabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ śūnyatvaṃ nāsti tac ca śūnyatvam /
T04nagvigvu:715: yā tarhi te pratijñā sataḥ pratiṣedho bhavati nāsata iti sā hīnā //
T04nagvigvu:718: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit /
T04nagvigvu:719: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eva tvayā kriyate // NagVv_63 //
T04nagvigvu:720: evam api tu kṛtvā yady ahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tato yuktam eva vaktuṃ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:721: na caivahaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhayāmi tasmān na kiñcit pratiṣedhavyam asti /
T04nagvigvu:722: tasmāt śūnyeṣu sarvabhāveṣv avidyamāne pratiṣedhye pratiṣedhayasīty eṣa tvayātra sadbhūto 'dhilayaḥ kriyata iti //
T04nagvigvu:724: atha nāsti sa svabhāvaḥ kin nu pratiṣidhyate tvayānena
T04nagvigvu:725: vacanena rte vacanāt pratiṣedhaḥ sidhyate hy asataḥ // [12]
T04nagvigvu:727: yac cāhaṃ te vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhavacanasiddhir iti /
T04nagvigvu:728: atra jñāpayate vāg asad iti tan na pratinihanti // NagVv_64 //
T04nagvigvu:731: sate 'pi vacanād asataḥ pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddhaḥ tatra kin niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvāḥ iti /
T04nagvigvu:733: atra brūmaḥ niḥsvabhāvā iti etat khalu vacanaṃ na niḥsvabhāvān sarvabhāvān karoti /
T04nagvigvu:734: kintv asata svabhāva bhāvānām asata svabhāvānām iti jñāpayati /
T04nagvigvu:735: tatra kaścit brūyād avidyamāhagṛhe devadattas tam asti gṛhe devadatta iti /
T04nagvigvu:738: kintu jñāpayati kevalam asadbhāvaṃ gṛhe devadattasyeti //
T04nagvigvu:739: tadvā nāsti svabhāvo bhāvānām ity etadvacanaṃ na svabhāvānāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvaṃ karoti /
T04nagvigvu:741: tatra yad bhavatoktaṃ kim asati svabhāve nāsti svabhāva ity etadvacanaṃ karoti /
T04nagvigvu:747: evaṃ mithyāgrāhaḥ syāt te prasidhyate hy asataḥ / [13]
T04nagvigvu:748: yat punar bhavato mṛgātṛṣṇāyām ity atra brūmaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:749: mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte yaḥ punar uktaṃ tvayā mahāṃś carcaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:750: tatrāpi nirṇayaṃ śṛṇu yathā sa dṛṣṭānta upapannaḥ // NagVv_65 //
T04nagvigvu:751: ya eva tvayā mṛgatṛṣṇādṛṣṭānte mahāṃś carca uktaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:752: tatrāpi tayā nirṇayaḥ sa śrūyatāṃ upapanna eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
T04nagvigvu:753: sa yadi svabhāvataḥ syād bhāvo na syāt pratītya samudbhūtaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:754: yaś ca pratītya hhavati grāho nanu śūnyatā saiva // NagVv_66 //
T04nagvigvu:755: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ sa yathājalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:757: yato mṛgatṛṣṇāñ ca pratītya viparītañ ca darśanaṃ pratītya yoniśomanaskārañ ca pratītya
T04nagvigvu:758: prādurbhūto ataḥ pratītyasamutpannaḥ yataś ca pratītyasamutpanno 'taḥ svabhāvataḥ śūnya eva /
T04nagvigvu:762: yadi ca svabhāvataḥ syād grāhaḥ kas taṃ vinivartayed grāham /
T04nagvigvu:763: śeṣeṣv apy eṣa vidhiḥ tasmād eṣo 'nupālambhaḥ // NagVv_67 //
T04nagvigvu:764: yadi ca mṛgatṛṣṇāyāṃ jalagrāhaḥ svabhāvataḥ syāt /
T04nagvigvu:767: tathāgner uṣṇatvam apāṃ dravatvam ākāśasya niravavaraṇatvaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:770: yadā caitad evaṃ śeṣeṣv api dharmeṣv eṣa kramaḥ pratyavagantavyaḥ grāhyapravṛttiṣu pañcasu /
T04nagvigvu:771: tatra yad bhavato + + + + pād aśūnyāḥ sarvabhāvā iti tan na //
T04nagvigvu:774: hetoś ca te na siddhir naiḥsvabbāvyāt kuto hi te hetuḥ
T04nagvigvu:775: nirhetukasya siddhir na copapannāsya te 'rthasya [l7] iti //
T04nagvigvu:777: etena hetvabhāvaḥ pratyuktaḥ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
T04nagvigvu:779: etenaiva cedānīṃ carcena pūrvoktena hetvabhāvo 'pi pratyavagantavyaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:780: ya eva hi carcaḥ pūrvasmin hetāv uktaḥ ṣaṭkapratiṣe + + + + + + hāpi carcayitavyaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:783: pūrvaṃ cet pratiṣedhaḥ paścāt pratiṣedhyam ily anupapannaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:784: paścāc cānupapanno yugapac ca yataḥ svabhāvo 'sana // [20]
T04nagvigvu:786: yat traikālye hetuḥ pratyuktaṃ pūrvam eva sa samatvāt /
T04nagvigvu:788: sa eṣa hetuḥ traikālye pratiṣedhavācī sa tūktottaraḥ pratyavamantaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:790: yathā hi pratiṣedhas traikālye nopapady.e + + + + + + pratiṣedhapratiṣedhe 'pi /
T04nagvigvu:791: tasmāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhye 'sati bhavān manyate pratiṣedhaḥ pratisiddha iti tan na /
T04nagvigvu:792: yataś caiṣa trikālapratiṣedhavācī hetur eṣa eva śūnyatāvādināṃ prāptaḥ sarvabhāvasvabhāvapratiṣedhakatvān na bhavataḥ /
T04nagvigvu:794: pratiṣedhayāmi nāhaṃ kiñcit pratiṣedhyam asti na ca kiñcit
T04nagvigvu:795: tasmāt pratiṣedhayasīty adhilaya eṣa tvayā kriyata [63] iti //
T04nagvigvu:797: atha manyase triṣv api kāleṣu + + + + + + + dṛṣṭaḥ pūrvakālīno 'pi hetuḥ uttarakālīno 'pi /
T04nagvigvu:801: yathā śiṣyācāryasya yugapatkālīnaḥ yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasyeti //
T04nagvigvu:803: na caitad eva yuktā hy etasmiṃ traye pūrvadoṣaḥ //
T04nagvigvu:804: api ca punaḥ yady evaṃ kamaḥ /
T04nagvigvu:809: prabhavati ca śūnyateyaṃ yasya prabhavanti tasya sarvārthāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:810: prabhavati na tasya kinna prabhavati śūnyatā yasyeti // NagVv_70 //
T04nagvigvu:811: yasya śūnyateyaṃ prabhavati tasya sarvārthā laukikalokottarāḥ prabhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:813: yasya hi śūnyatā prabhavati tasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati /
T04nagvigvu:814: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavati tasya catvāry āryasatyāni prabhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:819: yasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ prabhavanti tasya dharmo dharmahetur dharmaphalañ ca prabhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:821: tasya kleśaḥ kleśasamudayaḥ kleśavastūni ca prabhavanti /
T04nagvigvu:822: yasyaitat sarvaṃ bhavati pūrvoktaṃ tasya sugatiṃ durgatiṃ vyavasthā + + + + + + + gatidurgatigamanaṃ /
T04nagvigvu:824: sugatidurgatigamanavyatikramaṇaṃ sugatidurgativyatikramopāyaḥ sarvasaṃvyavahārāś ca lokikāḥ svayam adhigantavyāḥ /
T04nagvigvu:825: anayā diśā kiñcit śakyaṃ vacanopadeṣṭam iti /
T04nagvigvu:829: anekārthāṃ nijagāda praṇamāmi tam apratimaṃ tu buddhim iti //
T04nagvigvu:831: // likhitam idaṃ śrīdhramakirtinā sarvasatvahetoḥ yathālabdham iti //
